userdoc.notice: Solidity NatSpec formatPepito is a Caribbian corsair. He can create PepitoDisguise in this demoA disguise is composed of many features, each feature has many optionsCurrently, features and options are hard-coded in a array to optise blockchain storage... once moved to IPFS, features and options will be key-value pairs, open-endedCopy this contract to generate also farmers, refugees, homeless persons etc.A disguise is a farmer, with a wallet of tokens populated by anybody who reads the description of the disguise
